name: Call of the Green Man
summary: You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body.
description:
You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body. Once per day, you can cast plant form as a 5th-level primal innate spell. When you reach 17th level, this spell can be heightened to 6th level.Traits

Leshy: Leshies are living plants animated by primal magic.
